document_name: Adaptation to CC in the Nile Delta Through ICZM.pdf
http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/EGY/00057676/Adaptation to CC in the Nile Delta Through ICZM.pdf

outputs.output_descr: The project aims to integrate the management of SLR risks into the development of Egypt's Low Elevation Coastal Zone (LECZ) in the Nile Delta by strengthening the regulatory framework and institutional capacity to improve resilience of coastal settlements and development infrastructure, implement innovative and environmentally friendly measures that facilitate/promote adaptation in the Nile Delta, and establish a monitoring and assessment framework and knowledge management systems on adaptation.

project_descr: Adaptation to Climate Change in the Nile Delta through Integrated Coastal Zone Management
project_title: Adaptation to Climate Change in the Nile Delta
